item.title: Lab Overview
item.description: Lab: Startup Matchmaker You have been hired to turn Startup Matchmaker into a fully responsive site Requirements Using Atom, open the folder called startup_matchmaker in your lesson_16_files folder. You will be using these files as starting off point. Update Startup Matchmaker so the homepage’s content is effectively displayed on tablets or below (viewport width: 768px or below)

item.title: Milestone #1
item.description: Follow the steps below to complete Milestone #1: In groups: Create wireframes (sketches) of your proposed layout for mobile version (tablet and below) of the Startup Matchmaker landing page Some things to think about: Will you need to hide menus? What content should be featured on a narrow screen? Time box: 15 minutes

item.title: Milestone #2
item.description: Follow the steps below to complete Milestone #2: In pairs (or groups): Add the the required media query / breakpoint that optimize the content to be viewable on screens that have a viewport of 768px or below. Use your wireframes created from Milestone #1 to help guide you as you add the styles necessary make viewing the landing page on tablets or below an optimal experience Time box: 45 minutes

item.title: Milestone #3
item.description: Follow the steps below to complete the Milestone #3: In pairs (or groups): Implement a hamburger menu that will be displayed on narrow screens When the user clicks on the hamburger menu, the hidden navigation items (i.e. Developers, Designers, How It Works, Our Team) should slide down Time box: 30 minutes Hint: Review the Responsive Marketing Layout Code Along for an example of how to implement a hamburger menu
